questionCreateModalAmountTooLowForWebsit: Amount below {amount} GB, question will be treated by Autonomous Agent but won't be displayed on this website as spam protection.
questionCreateModalQuestionRequirements: Should be answerable by Yes or No, {min_length} characters minimum.
questionCreateModaLinkHeader: Clicking the link below will open your Obyte wallet, ready to send a transaction that will create this question.
questionCreateModaLinkFooter: It will be taken into account a few minutes after the transaction is confirmed.
